title: How to Mod the Memory Stick Pro Duo

steps.headline: Cut off about 5 inches (12.7 cm) of scotch tape.
Tape one end (about half an inch) of the tape on to the end of the Memory Stick PRO Duo.
Place the paper clip end to end with the Memory Stick PRO Duo on the tape.
Bring the remaining tape around the clip and tape it on the other side of the memory stick PRO Duo.
Take about 1 inch (2.5 cm) of tape and secure around the memory stick PRO Duo and the paper clip.
Use the paper clip and push the memory stick in, making sure it is aligned with the slot.

tyn: Jumbo Paper Clip (or alternative; see Tips)
text: Cut off about 5 inches (12.7 cm) of scotch tape.  Tape one end (about half an inch) of the tape on to the end of the Memory Stick PRO Duo.  Place the paper clip end to end with the Memory Stick PRO Duo on the tape.  Bring the remaining tape around the clip and tape it on the other side of the memory stick PRO Duo.  Take about 1 inch (2.5 cm) of tape and secure around the memory stick PRO Duo and the paper clip.  Use the paper clip and push the memory stick in, making sure it is aligned with the slot.

Use the paper clip and push the memory stick in, making sure it is aligned with the slot.
